name: TNAFlix Video Downloader
tagline: Save TNAFlix videos instantly for offline viewing.
description:
TNAFlix Video Downloader gives creators and teams a dependable way to save TNAFlix videos instantly for offline viewing. Instead of juggling manual captures or questionable browser extensions, it pulls content directly from TNAFlix with consistent quality and predictable results.

It supports High-quality videos with resolution options, Batch download support for multiple selections, and Auto thumbnail and metadata extraction, so you can move quickly from download to delivery without tedious rework. Use it to archive TNAFlix assets, prep client deliverables, or keep your library accessible when connectivity is limited.
seo_title: TNAFlix Video Downloader | Download TNAFlix Videos
seo_description: Download TNAFlix videos easily for offline viewing. Fast, reliable TNAFlix video downloader with high-quality downloads.
features: Detects TNAFlix video players across site variations
Lists available MP4 resolutions sorted best to worst
Downloads MP4 files directly through the browser without re-encoding
Shows on-page progress with percentage, size, and status updates
Supports Chrome, Edge, Firefox, Brave, and Opera on desktop
Stores licence data locally with no tracking or hidden analytics

pricing.label: One-time
pricing.note: Lifetime licence with quality selection and progress tracking included. Sales are final.

faqs.question: How do I download a TNAFlix video with this extension?
faqs.answer: Open the video, click the downloader icon, choose your desired resolution, and keep the tab open while the progress bar completes. The MP4 will save automatically.

faqs.question: Does it work on all TNAFlix sections and mirrors?
faqs.answer: Yes. The extension recognises both tnaflix.com and www.tnaflix.com variations and handles categories across the site.

faqs.question: Can I download several videos at once?
faqs.answer: Downloads run one at a time to keep progress accurate. Queue the next video after the current download finishes.

faqs.question: Which browsers are supported?
faqs.answer: Builds are available for Chrome, Edge, Firefox, Brave, and Opera on Windows, macOS, and Linux desktops.

faqs.question: Does it remove watermarks or re-encode video?
faqs.answer: No. The downloader saves the original MP4 file exactly as TNAFlix serves it—no re-encoding or watermark removal.

faqs.question: Is my activity private?
faqs.answer: All detection and downloading happen locally. The extension only checks your licence and never uploads viewing history.

reviews.name: Blake Johnson
reviews.review: Options are sorted best to worst, so I grab the highest resolution and the MP4 is ready a minute later.
reviews.title: Quality choice is instant

reviews.name: Nika Alvarez
reviews.review: I like seeing percentage and size as it downloads. No surprises and files save exactly as expected.
reviews.title: Progress stays accurate

reviews.name: Jordan Pike
reviews.review: No pop-ups or extra apps. Click, wait, done—and everything stays on my machine.
reviews.title: Simple and private

permission_justifications.justification:
Required for downloading TNAFlix videos straight to the user's computer with progress tracking.

Usage highlights:
- `background-enhanced.js` initiates downloads via the Chrome Downloads API.
- Download listeners monitor progress and state changes to keep the UI updated.

Needed to inspect the active tab so the extension can confirm the user is on a TNAFlix page and extract the correct video data.

Usage highlights:
- `popup.js` queries the active tab before enabling download controls.
- Tab lookups feed content script messaging for video detection.

Persists activation state, license metadata, and extension preferences to keep premium features unlocked.

Usage highlights:
- `auth.js` saves and retrieves activation details (status, license key, email).
- `popup.js` reads stored activation info during startup.
- Extension settings leverage storage for configuration.

Enables desktop notifications so users receive feedback about download completion, errors, or status changes.

Usage highlights:
- Download success and failure toasts notify users when actions finish.
- Error notifications surface issues that require user attention.

Allows the extension to add quick-download context menu actions on TNAFlix video pages.

Usage highlights:
- Right-click menu entries trigger immediate downloads from video pages.

Supports tab messaging, querying, and opening helper pages needed for download workflows.

Usage highlights:
- `popup.js` sends messages to content scripts running within tabs.
- Active tab queries drive video detection logic.
- Help and documentation pages open in new tabs when requested.

Provides a fallback mechanism to inject content scripts dynamically when automatic injection is unavailable.

Usage highlights:
- `popup.js` can inject the content script on demand to recover from loading issues.
- Dynamic script injection ensures video extraction works across TNAFlix page variations.
